mapper.sql: tzid, tid, tfromid, tmodule, tname, ttype, tpririty, tuserBy_id, tcreateDate, testimate, tconsumed, tleft, tdeadline, tassignedTo_id, testStarted, trealStarted, tfinishedDate, tclosedBy_id, tclosedDate, tclosedReason, tstatus
mapper.select: select tid,tcreateDate,urealname,tfromid,tpririty,tname from task,user where tassignedTo_id = #{uid} and tstatus = #{status} and tuserBy_id = uid group by tid,tcreateDate,tfromid,tpririty,tname order by task.tpririty limit #{page},#{pagenum};
select count(tid) from task where tassignedTo_id = #{uid} and tstatus = #{status};

select
distinct
,
from task
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from task
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into task (tzid, tid, tfromid, tmodule, tname, ttype, tpririty, tuserBy_id, tcreateDate, testimate, tconsumed, tleft, tdeadline, tassignedTo_id, testStarted, trealStarted, tfinishedDate, tclosedBy_id, tclosedDate, tclosedReason, tstatus, tdesc) values (#{tzid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tfromid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tmodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tpririty,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tuserbyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{testimate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tconsumed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tleft,jdbcType=REAL}, #{tdeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tassignedtoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teststarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trealstarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tfinisheddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tclosedbyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tcloseddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tclosedreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tdesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update task
tzid = #{record.tzid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tid = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tfromid = #{record.tfromid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tmodule = #{record.tmodule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tname = #{record.tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ttype = #{record.ttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tpririty = #{record.tpririty,jdbcType=CHAR},

tclosedBy_id = #{record.tclosedbyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

tclosedReason = #{record.tclosedreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tstatus = #{record.tstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
tdesc = #{record.tdesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
